profiles.name: neutral_informational
profiles.description: Facts-first, balanced tone without emotional language
profiles.example: This subscription provides access to trading signals and educational resources. Members receive daily market analysis and can participate in community discussions. The platform includes tools for tracking performance.

profiles.name: light_conversational
profiles.description: Friendly, approachable, like talking to a knowledgeable friend
profiles.example: So you're looking to level up your trading game? This community might be worth checking out. You get access to signals, some solid educational content, and a group of people working toward similar goals.

profiles.name: value_benefit_led
profiles.description: Emphasizes what the user gains, outcomes-focused
profiles.example: Save on your membership while getting full access to premium features. You get daily signals, live trading sessions, and a library of educational content. This means more value without paying full price.

profiles.name: risk_transparency
profiles.description: Upfront about limitations, honest about what to expect
profiles.example: This platform offers trading signals and educational resources. However, results vary based on market conditions and individual decisions. It's worth noting that past performance doesn't guarantee future outcomes. Review the terms before committing.

profiles.name: community_support
profiles.description: Emphasizes belonging, peer connection, shared journey
profiles.example: Join a community of traders working toward their goals. You'll connect with others who share your interests, exchange ideas, and learn from different perspectives. It's about growing together rather than going it alone.

profiles.name: expert_guide
profiles.description: Authoritative, knowledgeable, positions the creator as an expert
profiles.example: This program draws on years of market experience and proven methodologies. The curriculum covers technical analysis, risk management, and trade execution. Members gain access to frameworks that have been refined through extensive real-world application.

profiles.name: beginner_friendly
profiles.description: Simple language, no jargon, welcoming to newcomers
profiles.example: New to trading? No problem. This community is built for people just starting out. You'll find easy-to-follow guides and a supportive group ready to help you learn the basics.

profiles.name: promotional_light
profiles.description: Enthusiastic but not spammy, highlights the offer
profiles.example: Here's a chance to access premium trading tools at a discount. Use the code to save on your membership. You'll get all the features—signals, education, community—at a better price.

profiles.name: concise_minimalist
profiles.example: Trading signals. Daily analysis. Active community. All included. Use the code. Save on membership.

profiles.name: rich_descriptive
profiles.description: Detailed, thorough explanations, paints a full picture
profiles.example: This comprehensive trading community offers members access to a wide range of resources designed to support their trading journey. The platform includes daily market analysis prepared by experienced traders, along with educational modules covering everything from fundamental concepts to advanced strategies. Members also benefit from an active discussion forum where they can exchange ideas, ask questions, and share insights with fellow traders who are navigating similar challenges.
